mapper.select: SELECT endpoint, count(endpoint) count FROM statistics where endpoint != 'clear' GROUP by endpoint order by count asc, endpoint asc

SELECT data.percentage, s.storename FROM (SELECT levels, storeNo, ROUND((RATIO_TO_REPORT(count(levels)) OVER(PARTITION by storeNo) * 100),2) percentage FROM statistics group by levels, storeNo) data, store s where data.storeNo = s.storeNo and levels='쉬움' order by percentage asc
SELECT to_char(challengedate, 'yyyy') year FROM statistics GROUP BY to_char(challengedate, 'yyyy') order by year desc

SELECT percentage, month FROM (SELECT to_char(challengedate, 'YYYY') year, storeNo, endPoint, ROUND((RATIO_TO_REPORT(count(endPoint)) OVER(PARTITION by to_char(challengedate, 'MM'), to_char(challengedate, 'YYYY')) * 100),2) percentage, to_char(challengedate, 'MM') month FROM statistics GROUP BY to_char(challengedate, 'MM'), endPoint, storeNo, to_char(challengedate, 'YYYY') order by to_char(challengedate, 'MM') asc) where storeNo = 1 and endPoint = 'clear' and year = #{year}

SELECT percentage FROM (SELECT storeNo, endPoint, ROUND((RATIO_TO_REPORT(count(endPoint)) OVER(PARTITION BY storeNo) * 100),2) percentage FROM statistics group by endPoint, storeNo) where endPoint = 'clear' and storeNo = 1
